mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_NAME ,D.ORDER_NUM ,O.REQUEST_NUM ,ORDER_DATE ,ORDER_STATUS ,C.CUSTOMER_NUM ,C.CUSTOMER_NAME ,C.CUSTOMER_ADDR ,(R.QUANTITY * P.PRODUCT_PRICE) as TOTALPRICE ,D.DELIVERY_DRIVER_NAME ,D.DELIVERY_DRIVER_PHONE ,D.DELIVERY_STATUS FROM order_requests R, orders O , customers C, products P ,delivery D WHERE O.REQUEST_NUM = R.REQUEST_NUM AND R.CUSTOMER_NUM = C.CUSTOMER_NUM AND R.PRODUCT_NUM = P.PRODUCT_NUM
mapper.update: UPDATE orders O JOIN delivery D ON O.ORDER_NUM = D.ORDER_NUM SET O.ORDER_STATUS = '배송중' WHERE D.DELIVERY_NUM = #{deliveryNum};
update delivery set DELIVERY_STATUS = '배송완료' ,DELIVERY_END_TIME = NOW() where DELIVERY_NUM = #{deliveryNum};
